Install Package
```{r}
library(IEAnalyzeR)
library(readxl)
```

Load Data
```{r}
pam<-read_xlsx("../data/biological/BeakedPAM.xlsx",col_names = F)
recfish<-read_xlsx("../data/humandimensions/RecFishing.xlsx", col_names = c("a","b","c"))
blue_crab<-read.csv("../data/test_data/bluecrab_cat.csv", header = F)


```

Testing Package
```{r}
#Data Function
blue_crab_df<-IEAnalyzeR::data_prep(blue_crab)
IEAnalyzeR::data_prep(pam)
recfish_df<-IEAnalyzeR::data_prep(recfish)


#Plot Function
IEAnalyzeR::plot_fn_obj(blue_crab_df, interactive = T)
```
